default_customizations.description: For each unique customization slot, the default attachment.

optics_crosshair_params.description: Offset and scale applied to the crosshair node in the optics unit. X=Forward offset, Y=Scale.

material_override.description: Overrides the base material of the weapon.

magazine_adjusting_nodes.description: [string]Do we have any magazine nodes that need to be autoadjusted based on rounds left?

magazine_adjusting_nodes_visible_chamber.description: [bool]The very first node in the list will only be hidden if there isn't a chambered round

magazine_adjusting_animation.description: [string]Animation to play on the magazine when adjusting the rounds (outside of the initial spawn).

magazine_adjusting_animation_variable.description: [string]Animation variable to adjust with the rounds on the magazine.

ik_attach_setting.description: What unit should we attach our left hand to? If set to None, it will default to the weapon

ik_attach_animation_event.description: [string]Animation event to call, if an attachment is specified for altering our left hand.
